title: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect
body:
I love when I get this error while literally everything else internet-related works fine

{{champion:23}} :undying rage

replies.body: Update - it looks like there's a service issue with the login servers on NA. No eta, but I'll keep things posted here if there are delays. Thanks for the reports, friends!
Please update service status.  I spent half an hour troubleshooting.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/JrHyF9wY-for-those-having-rads-issue-or-having-the-beta-launcher-fail-to-connect-here-is-a-fix-i-use

Everything internet related can work fine, but that doesn't mean you can't have problems connecting to a specific server.  In this case, it seems that your network is blocking comms with one of our servers.  Go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions and when specifically you're seeing that if it persists.

I am having the same issue as those before me. My internet works fine, but I am unable to login. Given the number of people who suddenly seem to be experiencing this, it may very well be a server-sided issue.

http://puu.sh/sHNZ3/9e5024ca64.jpg
It certainly is server-sided
Porocles, I tried the guide to no avail. Save us, Porocles! Save us!

Noooo!  If the connection guide hasn't help, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help investigate.  Also, grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to the ticket to help give context.  We'll reply back as soon as possible!
Will do. Ticket incoming.

Thanks!  In the meantime out of curiosity, are you able to login through the legacy client?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

l3cdn.riotgames.com seems to be down. The legacy client is getting a RADS error, the new client is getting the image posted, and if you re-install the game, you can't, because you get the same RADS error.

A ping and tracert of l3cdn.riotgames.com gives you a ping request couldn't find the host and unable to resolve the target system name.

Legacy Client is giving RADS Error.
New Client is stating "There is a problem...blablabl".

Server sided.

i am able to login through client everything works fine login,champ select then the loading screen appears my client. 
 all the players champ load but not mine then the game kicks me out  {{champion:32}}

> [{quoted}](name=Praedonum,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=v7REApzJ,comment-id=000000040000000000000007,timestamp=2017-11-05T11:53:46.940+0000)
>
> i am able to login through client everything works fine login,champ select then the loading screen appears my client. 
>  all the players champ load but not mine then the game kicks me out  {{champion:32}}

me too. just shows the message : "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect." Hextech Repair Tool cant help me. And i submitted so many requests no answer for me no solutions for me HEEEEEEELP https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/Porocles
I don't know about him, but its happening before I can even attempt to log in. So I can't click any buttons because the error notification makes it impossible.
Same

There is a work-around for this. Right click league in the task bar, click close window, and when prompted to do so, instead say "NO". Then you can log in. Unfortunately, the PLAY button is Grayed-out, so you can't play. Instead, if I select Launch legacy client, I get "Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access.

I was able to long into and get into the client doing it like that, my internet should be fine since I'm on the same computer typing this though.

Not sure about the firewall, usually if its blocking something it'll have a notification pop-up since this profile is the admin on the computer.
I was able to get on properly now, thanks.

I did what you said, and yes the Play button was grayed out, eventually though I tabbed back into the Client and I can play!

Strange how that works.

same with me. it was letting me login and i was about to start a game then i got the message and now i am getting it right when the client opens. sometimes it lets me login but then i get the message within 30 sec after

I am having this new issue as well. My first thought was to try to legacy client.
When you have this connection error you can not click the text to start the legacy client.
The only clickable buttons are restart and shutdown.

Further more I have restarted my PC and been able to open League and sign in. 
after a few seconds(enough time to send a message) I get the connection error and am forced to shutdown or restart.

I went into the User.cfg file and tried to change my opt out settings and that has not let me go back to legacy either.
I also went into the Lol_launcher releases folder and can not launch from there either.
same
iv tried everything and i have even reinstalled the patch and nothing has happened. i am still getting the same message

The first option is impossible due to the client being noninteractive with the connection error window open. Only two options: restart or shutdown.

Doing the 2nd option I get a RADS Error and cannot connect to HTTP server.

I never had this issues before, but suddenly...

http://prnt.sc/dgobo9

> [{quoted}](name=CV Zephyrin,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=v7REApzJ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-12-07T23:25:02.399+0000)
>
> I never had this issues before, but suddenly...
> 
> http://prnt.sc/dgobo9

Same thing here{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

OKay then, same problem here EUW.

Neither legacy (RADS Error) nor Btea Cient (same as Hasp) works.

This is

#NOT

on our systems, its happening everywhere and for everyone at once now.

Hey, someone posted a potential fix for this problem. This solution also seems to fix the RADS error bug for the legacy client.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U4A0Q9o85Ec

> [{quoted}](name=Hitmanimal,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=v7REApzJ,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2016-12-08T00:07:12.368+0000)
>

godsend

This worked for me.
I'm assuming its the patch I got today. I patched and played earlier. But now I can't log in. Says my internet's down. Same as you guys so I guess I'm just here to bump. (Time Warner Cable)

I'm Comcast, my friend with Comcast is having the same issue.

Clearly it isn't an "us" thing.
I'm having the same issue. I can connect to anything else on the Internet that I've tried so far.

**THE SAME WITH ME !
_RIOT GAMES_ PLZ FIX THIS BUG I WANT TO PLAY !
AND NOT ONLY A BUG WHEN MY TEAM REMAKE I HAVE GOT 20 MINUTES LEAVERS !!!
PLZ HURRY UP TO FIX THIS !**
**AND I THINK IF I REINSTALL THE GAME WILL FIX THE BUG BUT NO ?!**
{{sticker:darius-angry}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
I just had this issue happen to me...
EU west server refuses to reconnect. And I was playing 2min ago

This is true, a frustrating predicament that has had me delay my placements all the way up until now, its even worse on pbe cant even get into a game ever after numerous tries. it never used to happen and suddenly its become the norm, it likely has little to do with any of our connections, but suffice to say, it is very hard for bigger companies to make a statement on it to avoid backlash and make any big detrimental changes if it had happened to be only a select few with the issue.
same thing. Never appeared before update
This is also happening on the PBE server too for some reason its not just NA.
Restarting your computer will usually fix it according to a lot of people. It worked for me.
May want to update the server status page so people don't think its on their end.
